name: Knuckles Murphy
overview: Knuckles Murphy is a relentless brawler from the GGG, known for bare-knuckle prowess and unwavering grit.
visual_description: Wears a flat cap and tweed jacket. Carries a brass knuckles. Weathered hands show years of hard labor.
vibe: Rough around the edges but loyal to the bone. Salt of the earth.
